name: 2020.01/ProjetoVII/System Aimed for Salvation
description:
Summary

System Aimed for Salvation or SAS, is a 3D boss-rush third-person game focused on combat and exploration developed in Unity.

Story

N-01, number 01 type N is a robot which was sent to a planet with a mission. Something happens and N-01 is deactivated due to some damage to it's system. After a long time he is reactivated by a explorer bot which found him by chance. Together, N-01 sets out to explore and find anwers to understand what happened to him, the planet and his mission.

Characteristic
  • 7° Semester(Final Project)
  • Hack'n'Slash Combat
  • Boss Rush
  • Open World
